//Assume:
// less than 32k sets
// 16 ways
// 64 byte lines

//Simple test to ensure correct update of LRU bits. 
//Fills the cache, then read all the even lines.
// That should make initial evictions of all odds.
// then evict evens

0 800000
2 1000000
0 1800000
2 2000000
0 2800000
2 3000000
0 3800000
2 4000000
0 4800000
2 5000000
0 5800000
2 6000000
0 6800000
2 7000000
0 7800000
2 8000000

// read even 0,2,4,6,8,10,12,14
0 800000
0 1800000
0 2800000
0 3800000
0 4800000
0 5800000
0 6800000
0 7800000

// should evict odd 1,9,5,13,3,11,7,15
0 8800000
0 9000000
0 A000000
0 B000000
2 c000000
1 d000000
0 e000000
2 f000000

// should evict even 0,8,4,12,2,10,6,14
2 1000000
2 2000000
2 3000000
2 4000000
2 5000000
2 6000000
2 7000000
2 8000000
